title: Ordering flowers from a florist
context: Tell a florist exactly what kind of bouquet you want to send.

content.bestLine: I'd like a bouquet with roses and lilies, please.

neutral.text: Can I get a bouquet with mixed flowers?
I need a flower arrangement for a birthday.

formal.text: I would like to place an order for a custom bouquet.
